main event: An observer reported seeing an unidentified flying object while UFO hunting in Milledgeville, Georgia, on 22 October 1967.
interesting points: The observer reported seeing heat waves around the object that were unexplained., The observation lasted between 5 to 10 minutes., The case was concluded as a probable hoax due to insufficient data., The observer tried to take photographs but was unable to capture the object in clear detail., Local police documented additional sightings in the area during the same time period.
witness description: The observer was a civilian who was actively searching for UFOs.
